ValidationRule.description: Persona must filled in prior to converting a traditional or channel lead.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( $User.Bypass_Validation__c = FALSE,
or( left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Lead_TraditionalEnrollment , 15), left( RecordTypeId , 15) = left( $Label.RT_Lead_ChannelEnrollment , 15) ),
IsConverted = TRUE, ISBLANK(text(Persona__c)),
or( ischanged(IsConverted), ischanged(Persona__c) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please select the Persona before converting the lead.
